country.country_description: Xenor is a distant planet located in a distant galaxy. It is home to a peaceful alien species.
country.people_description: The people of Xenor are friendly and welcoming. They are very open-minded and accepting of different cultures.
country.language_description: Xenorish is a language spoken on the planet Xenor. It is composed of a mix of spoken and written words, and includes many unique symbols.

quenta.job_duties: Analyze data for the company to make better decisions
